title: Suraj Tayade
text: Hi all, I recommend not using this app go for other options. Due to their technical glitches, I lost money while placing a trade. Their system let me place an order beyond my available balance, and I incurred a loss. As per their policy, the issue is marked resolved, but I am not satisfied with the resolution, and my money is still lost. So, my review remains unchanged. They have no proper backup. ex, HDFC fall 50% but grow show 0.89% many stock suddenly increases from 40rs to 5k don't use it.
author: Suraj Tayade

title: Papiya Dawn
text: Update :The recent change in the option chain layout has made the platform less user-friendly. Earlier, it was simple to view call and put around the strike price directly from the chart. Now, being forced to search each option individually is cumbersome and meaningless. Developers should understand, traders need fast access to option chain data for analysis, not just for buy/sell buttons. The app is fantastic but not CC. So 5 star for app but negative stars for customer care and sudden change.
author: Papiya Dawn
